Calendar Search Emoji Calculator Profile ⌘P Billing ⌘B Settings ⌘S ), } export const Dialog: Story = { args: { className: "rounded-lg border shadow-md", }, render: (args) => , } const CommandDialogDemo = (args: Story["args"]) => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const down = (e: KeyboardEvent) => { if (e.key === "j" && (e.metaKey || e.ctrlKey)) { e.preventDefault() setOpen((open) => !open) } } document.addEventListener("keydown", down) return () => document.removeEventListener("keydown", down) }, []) return ( <>
